title: The Last Note
description: Crack the case of a mysterious death using clues hidden in notes, files, and evidence.

title: The Memory Loop
description: Decode fragmented memories to solve a psychological mystery.

title: The Lighthouse Keeper
description: A light that never went out. Discover what happened in the last stormy night.

title: Room 103
description: A locked door. A cryptic message. Solve the mystery in under 20 minutes.

title: One Hour Left
description: The clock is ticking. Find the truth before your time runs out.

title: All of You – Serial Killer Bundle
description: Solve 4 connected murders. 1 serial killer ties them all together. Can you catch them?

title: Labyrinth Adventure for Family
description: You find yourself trapped in a strange maze... Each document you uncover leads you closer to the exit — but only if you interpret them correctly.

title: A Deadly Encore – Solo Detective Game
description: A talented pianist is found dead after her final performance. Was it an accident… or her last note was a message? Search the stage, decode the evidence, and reveal the truth behind the encore no one expected.

title: The Last Appointment
description: A tense, psychology-driven detective case. Reconstruct the timeline, weigh the forensics, and name the killer.

title: The Justice Cutter
description: A tense, psychology-driven detective case. Reconstruct the timeline, weigh the forensics, and name the killer.

title: Forty-Eight Hours: A Cyanide Mystery
description: A gripping detective escape room case. Piece together hospital notes, forensics, receipts, and suspect interviews to uncover who poisoned Ethan Cole and why.

title: The Fifth Witness – Psychological Detective File Game
description: A psychological detective case file where the fifth witness never existed. Every document hides fragments of one broken memory. Can you piece together the truth?

title: Trick or Treat Gone Wrong
description: A Halloween night turns deadly when a harmless party becomes a murder scene. Six witnesses, eerie clues, and the truth buried under the word 'LIE'. Can you uncover who cut the power before midnight?

title: The Last Thanksgiving
description: A family reunion turns deadly on Thanksgiving night. Search through reports, interrogations, and hidden evidence to uncover who poisoned Arthur Holloway — and why.

title: Silent Night, Deadly Secret
description: A Christmas gala turns deadly when a man dressed as Santa collapses beside the glowing tree. Follow the reports, interviews, and digital clues to uncover who poisoned Harold Finch — and why.
